frontmatter.title: University of Groningen
frontmatter.subtitle: Hi, I'm Steve!
frontmatter.content:
Interested in complex systems, unconventional computing, human cognition and building wider artificial intelligence.
I am currently an early stage researcher in the MINDS research group research group in Groningen, as part of the European post-digital training network, supported by the European Commission under Horizon 2020 Marie Sk≈Çodowska-Curie ITN Action. During the PhD, I am working on non-digital computing theory with the goal of developing a formalism for exploiting physical phenomena for computation - with particular attention to neuromorphic applications.
I love to read and occasionally write about topics I am interested in. I enjoy telling stories as a photographer (see portfolio), and a hobby (amateur) film-maker.
